about_the_game:
Super vs. World is a local multiplayer 2D versus party game that lets up to 8 players combat each other and AI’s with classic platformer headstomping, brick breaking, weapon throwing gameplay!  Choose one of the unique characters and grab a multitude of weapons and power ups to pummel the competition.  Choose from a variety of game modes including Last Man Standing, Kill Count, King of the hill, and Capture the Flag.

Super vs. World lets you choose from a variety of theme packs each with unique Characters and Arenas, letting the fun take you from colorful cherry blossom hills to even haunted ghostly cliff-sides!

Current special theme packs included:

  • Classic

  • Halloween

  • Christmas

  • Ninja Cherry Blossom

  • 2024 US Election

Features include

  • Up to 8 local human (or AI) players simultaneously or over remote-play-together

  • Game modes including; Last Man Standing, Kill Count, King of the Hill, and Capture the Flag. Play solo (every-man-for-himself) or team-up with others in team play!

  • Over 120 single player challenge matches to beat in 3 different skill levels

  • 11 Arenas

  • Theme packs with unique Characters, Arenas, and cartoon Weapons

  • Variety of nostalgic cartoon Weapons including fuse bombs, rockets, earthquake blocks, banana peels (who doesn't love a well placed banana peel?), exploding skateboards, and more

  • Special Power-Ups including Bullet-Time and Invincibility, plus more

  • Over 35 colorful Characters, with more being added

  • Design and Add your own custom characters and share them with others - let your creative mind flow!

Super vs. World can be played Single Player against computer Characters (AI’s). Controllers are recommended for Multiplayer. Works via Remote-Play-Together.

(Although Super vs. World can be played against AI, we feel the most FUN way to play a game like this is with other humans - grab a friend, grab some family - have some fun!)

name: Super vs. World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 550 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Super vs. World is a local multiplayer 2D versus Party Game that lets you, and up to 7 other players (8 in total), compete in a variety of gaming modes from Last Man Standing, King of the Hill, and Capture the Flag, plus more! Grab your controller and have some fun with friends and family!
